Package org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation

Interface Summary
EventDispatcher The EventDispatcher interface defines a single method EventDispatcher.dispatchEvents(org.apache.jackrabbit.core.observation.EventStateCollection), through this method a collection of EventState instances is dispatched to registered EventListeners.
 

Class Summary
DispatchAction The DispatchAction class is a simple struct that defines what EventStates should be dispatched to which EventConsumers.
EventConsumer The EventConsumer class combines the EventListener with the implementation of specified filter for the listener: EventFilter.
EventFilter The EventFilter class implements the filter logic based on the session's access rights and the specified filter rules.
EventImpl Implementation of the Event interface.
EventListenerIteratorImpl  
EventState The EventState class encapsulates the session independent state of an Event.
EventStateCollection The EventStateCollection class implements how EventState objects are created based on the ItemStates passed to the EventStateCollection.createEventStates(org.apache.jackrabbit.core.state.ItemState) method.
FilteredEventIterator  
ObservationManagerFactory The class ObservationManagerFactory creates new ObservationManager instances for sessions.
